title: Chou to Hana no Kankeisei
sinopse:
Sakutarou Hanada, a new employee at a company, meets the carefree yet earnest Chouno, who is different from the strict seniors he had before... in more ways than one.

(Source: MU)

Included one-shots:
Volume 1: Himitsu no Koi no Todokesaki, Kimi ga Sunao ni Nareru made, Kimi ga Sunao ni Nareta Toki
